title: Патриот
overview: Having returned to a small town after the army, Sanya Kuchin tries to fit into a peaceful civilian life. In season 1, he gets a job as a security guard in a convenience store "Dream", gets the heart of his former classmate and struggles with the bourgeoisie, slovenliness, drunkenness and the local inhabitants of the refuse. But real life is not an army, where everything is organized clearly according to the regulations, and very soon Sanya will have to realize it.
